title: High-Frequency Trading (HFT) Platform
description: Developed an interactive, high-performance trading frontend using Next.js, React, TypeScript, and WebSockets, enabling real-time order book updates and dynamic price charts. Engineered a scalable backend with Node.js, Express, and GraphQL, using microservices, FIX Protocol, and Kafka for high-speed market data processing and secure trade execution.

title: Multi-Tenant SaaS E-Commerce Platform
description: Designed and developed a multi-tenant SaaS e-commerce platform using Spring Boot, Hibernate, and PostgreSQL. Implemented OAuth2 authentication with Spring Security and Keycloak, and optimized microservices with RabbitMQ for asynchronous order processing, reducing API response times by 40% during peak sales events.
